tiny_sparklers.name: Tiny Sparklers

big_ol_fireworks.name: big ol fireworks
big_ol_fireworks.description: You could probably halt a charging rhino with this one

atom_bomb.description: This will blow up your home town, no problem

uranium_fusion_bomb.name: uranium fusion bomb
uranium_fusion_bomb.description: If you want to disappear a whole continent, get this one

lil_dumptruck.name: lil dumptruck
lil_dumptruck.description: good for moving one rock at a time

lil_backhoe.name: lil backhoe
lil_backhoe.description: can move one grain of sand per day.

lil_plow.name: lil plow
lil_plow.description: moves a matchbox worth of dirt per millisecond

small_bobcat.name: small bobcat
small_bobcat.description: I used this to level aunt betty's trailer

medium_bobcat.name: medium bobcat
medium_bobcat.description: You could definitely tear down your elementary school with this one

pro_bobcat.name: pro bobcat
pro_bobcat.description: Burger King and McD's could get leveled in one night
